description: Rusty Muffler, on the east side of Skaha Lake, provides technical single track mountain biking at its finest.  A tough climb that gets tougher rewards you with endless Okanagan views and incredible technical descending through cliffs and forest.  A true classic!Bike shop / rentals: Freedom Bike Shop Accomodations: Summerland Resort
directions: Start at Smythe Drive just off Lakeside Road (the east side of Skaha Lake).  You'll eventually exit further down Eastside Road.
title: Rusty Muffler
